sentences.sentence: He has lots of original ideas about the research into microelectronics.
sentences.translation: 他对微电子学的研究很有创见。

sentences.sentence: If your project is developing an integrated circuit, you will have to take a module on advanced concepts in microelectronics.
sentences.translation: 如果你的项目是开发集成电路，你就必须学习一个课程，这个课程是关于微电子领域的先进概念。

sentences.sentence: Case study 2. Microelectronics "factory in a box".
sentences.translation: 案例研究2：microelectronics“盒子里的工厂”。
